definitions.definition: to touch with your lips, especially as a greeting, or to press your mouth onto another person's mouth in a sexual way:
examples: There was a young couple on the sofa, kissing passionately.
The breeze/sun kissed her bare shoulders.

definitions.definition: If you tell a child you will kiss a part of the body that hurts better, you mean you will make it feel better by kissing it:
examples: "Mummy, I hurt my knee." "Come here, darling, and let me kiss it better."
